description: Irregular table read by rows: T(n,k) is the number of regions formed after k diagonals, with k>=0, are drawn between vertices of a regular n-gon, with n>=3, when each vertex in turn is connected to the vertex floor(n/2) vertices to its left, then floor(n/2)-1 vertices to its left, then floor(n/2)-2 vertices ... until all vertices are connected by diagonals.
